name: The controversy of food
description:
Welcome to my TigerJ jam #2 entry, this is the story of a character that needs to go get food. On the way there, he finds a food factory and a lady trying to save the animals. You will be in his shoes fighting along to stop the madness happening inside of this factory.  Have fun! 

Thanks for the sounds ( found at freesound.org)

Music: PatrickLieberKind

Jump:BehanSean

Attack:SoundHolder

Library used : p5.js
